name: bing-web-search-api
description: Server implementation for Microsoft Bing Web Search API.

tools.name: bing_web_search
tools.description:
Performs a web search using the Bing Search API for general information
    and websites.

    Args:
        query: Search query (required)
        count: Number of results (1-50, default 10)
        offset: Pagination offset (default 0)
        market: Market code like en-US, en-GB, etc.

tools.name: bing_news_search
tools.description:
Searches for news articles using Bing News Search API for current
    events and timely information.

    Args:
        query: News search query (required)
        count: Number of results (1-50, default 10)
        market: Market code like en-US, en-GB, etc.
        freshness: Time period of news (Day, Week, Month)

tools.name: bing_image_search
tools.description:
Searches for images using Bing Image Search API for visual content.

    Args:
        query: Image search query (required)
        count: Number of results (1-50, default 10)
        market: Market code like en-US, en-GB, etc.

prompts.name: Web Search Example
prompts.description: Search the web for various queries.

prompts.name: News Search Example
prompts.description: Search for the latest news articles.

prompts.name: Image Search Example
prompts.description: Find images related to a query.

BING_API_KEY.description: API key required for authenticating requests to the Microsoft Bing Search API.
BING_API_KEY.title: BING_API_KEY
